messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Apology to LLL
messages.msgSnippet: why, bobby, hon, don t worry, i never mind being insulted..... at least i m not being ignored.. L (easier to type than Linda L Lindsey) ... From:
messages.messageBody:
why, bobby, hon, don't worry, i never mind being insulted..... at least i'm not being ignored..
L
(easier to type than Linda L Lindsey)
----- Original Message -----
From: rsale515@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 09, 2002 12:11 AM
Subject: Fwd: [Unschooling-dotcom] Apology to LLL


In a message dated 8/8/2002 9:11:23 PM Pacific Daylight Time, Rsale515
writes:
> Dear LLL (I'm sorry, I don't know your name),
>
> Debi and Sandra are right. I debated whether to reply when I did in the way
> I did and should have held my cool. I insulted you, even though you
> intended no insult toward me.
>
> I am sorry and ask that you forgive me, though you haven't a clue who I am,
> and such things via the web border on the trivial, though I don't see it as
> such.
>
> Sincerely,
>
> Bob Sale
